forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Snow this morning will transition to snow showers this afternoon. High 2C. Winds light and variable. Chance of snow 90%. 3-7cm of snow expected.
forecastday.fcttext: Snow this morning will transition to snow showers this afternoon. High 37F. Winds SW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of snow 100%. Snow accumulating 3 to 5 inches.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly clear. Low -11C. Winds ENE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly clear. Low 14F. Winds ENE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mainly sunny. High 4C. Winds ENE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly sunny. High 41F. Winds NE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Clear skies. Low -6C. Winds ENE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Clear skies. Low 23F. Winds ENE at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Generally sunny despite a few afternoon clouds. High 7C. Winds ENE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunshine and some clouds. High 48F. Winds ENE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy. Low -4C. Winds NE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies. Low 27F. Winds NE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Abundant sunshine. High 7C. Winds N at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunny skies. High 47F. Winds N at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Clear skies. Low -4C. Winds NE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Clear. Low 27F. Winds NE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mainly sunny. High near 10C. Winds NE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mainly sunny. High 52F. Winds NNE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly clear. Low -3C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: A mostly clear sky. Low 29F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Some sun in the morning with increasing clouds during the afternoon. High around 10C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies in the morning will give way to cloudy skies during the afternoon. High 52F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with snow showers developing after midnight. Low 1C. Winds light and variable. Chance of snow 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies early with showers later at night. Low 36F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Overcast with rain showers at times. High 8C. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. High 48F. Winds WSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers early transitioning to snow showers late. Low 3C. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of precip 60%. Snow accumulations less than 2cm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with showers. Low 39F. Winds WSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain and snow showers in the morning changing to mainly rain showers in the afternoon. High 7C. Winds WSW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 60%. Snowfall of 2-3cm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with rain and snow showers early changing to mainly rain showers in the afternoon. High 46F. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 60%. Snow accumulations less than one inch.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Variable clouds with snow showers. Low -6C. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of snow 60%. Snow accumulating 7-12cm.
forecastday.fcttext: Variably cloudy with snow showers. Low 23F. Winds WSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of snow 60%. Snow accumulating 3 to 5 inches.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Occasional snow showers. High 3C. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of snow 60%. 3-7cm of snow expected.
forecastday.fcttext: Variably cloudy with snow showers. High 41F. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of snow 60%. Snow accumulating 1 to 3 inches.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Intermittent snow showers, especially early. Low -6C. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of snow 40%. Snow accumulations less than 2cm.
forecastday.fcttext: Intermittent snow showers, especially early. Low 23F. Winds WSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of snow 40%. Snow accumulations less than one inch.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy in the morning followed by periods of snow showers later in the day. High 2C. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of snow 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies during the morning hours will give way to occasional snow showers in the afternoon. High 38F. Winds WSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of snow 40%.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Variable clouds with snow showers. Low -8C. Winds NW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of snow 50%. Snowfall of 2-3cm.
forecastday.fcttext: Occasional snow showers. Low 21F. Winds NW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of snow 50%. Snow accumulations less than one inch.
